attributes.action: help Oxana Kalemi be reunited with her children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sex traffic victim Oxana Kalemi was one of the thousands of women torn from her life and forced into prostitution.
But Oaxana was one of the lucky few who escaped and has since put her horrific experiences on paper in 'Mummy, Come Home.'
After years of being taken around Europe under gun point she eventually found herself in Britain where she escaped one of her many captors.
Oxana now needs our help to be reunited with her children.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
